definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

pinyin: ren2 sheng1 he2 chu4 bu4 xiang1 feng2

definition: Man has but one life, grass but one spring (idiom). fig. the brevity of human existence
pinyin: ren2 sheng1 yi1 shi4 , cao3 mu4 yi1 chun1

definition: human life as the morning dew (idiom); fig. ephemeral and precarious nature of human existence
human life as the morning dew (idiom); fig. ephemeral and precarious nature of human existence
life has its ups and downs (idiom)
Life is short, learning is limitless/Ars longa, vita brevis
pinyin: ren2 sheng1 duan3 zan4 , xue2 shu4 wu2 ya2

sentences.english: Captured with black and white film, her photography emulates the style of a cinematographer.
sentences.chinese: 黑白膠片同時也模擬着舞臺人生。

sentences.english: Going blind was the watershed of my life.
sentences.chinese: 失明成爲我人生的一個分水嶺。

sentences.english: It was this journey that changed Jiang Hao’s life radically.
sentences.chinese: 正是這次美國之旅，徹底改變了姜浩的人生。

sentences.english: True extremely not easily Huan Yao brave the life disturbances facing.
sentences.chinese: 人生的風風雨雨真的很不容易還要勇敢的面對。

sentences.english: Such had been his first dip into the dark abysses of existence.
sentences.chinese: 他第一次跌進人生黑暗深淵的情形就是這樣。

sentences.english: Dozens of years of life in haste, and all should strive for them to strive for.
sentences.chinese: 人生匆匆數十寒暑，一切都應自己去奮鬥，爭取。

sentences.english: That human frailty you blather about.
The stage is more beholding to love, than the life of man.
sentences.chinese: 舞臺較人生受惠於戀愛者爲多。

sentences.english: The Dunnings have a wealth of stories from the time they spent with Jackson.
sentences.chinese: 鄧寧斯有一段與傑克遜共同度過的寶貴的人生經歷。

sentences.english: You don't have tol bust your ass all the time. 'cause life is going on.
sentences.chinese: 你不要總是那麼拼命，人生還很長，要慢慢來。

sentences.english: Life is like a ten-speed bicycle. Most of us have gears we never use.
sentences.chinese: 人生如同變速自行車，很多檔，很多人都不曾用過。

sentences.english: There is a tide in the affairs of men.
This paper discusses the relationship between the truth perfect, beautiful life principle and university education.
sentences.chinese: 論述了求真求善求美的人生理念與大學教育的關係。

sentences.english: A clean house is a sign of a misspent life.
sentences.chinese: 一間乾淨的房子是一個浪費的人生的標誌。

sentences.english: We have only a limited time to work and build success while we live on this planet.
sentences.chinese: 人生在世，我們工作和追求成功的時間很有限。

sentences.english: Falling in love is the paradigmatic example of  an involuntary  life-affecting desire.
sentences.chinese: 墜入愛河是一個慾望不由自主影響人生的經典案例。

definition: life (as the characteristic of living beings)/living being/creature/CL:個|个[ge4],條|条[tiao2]
bumpy (of a road)/rough (of life)/to be down on one's luck/to be full of frustrations and dashed hopes
affairs of life/things of the world
sour, sweet, bitter and spicy hot/fig. the joys and sorrows of life
